paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In total, 30 patients were identified as carriers of the BRCA2 c.145G>T mutation.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with breast and ovarian cancer risk.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is one of the founder mutations identified in the study.
key_quotes: The presence of founder mutations constitutes a valuable opportunity to develop new strategies for genetic screening.
